title: Ryokan: a Japanese-style hotel
creator_credit: Shu Taguchi Productions and Japan. National Tourist Organisation
brief_description: Ryokan is a Japanese style hotel. This film shows its traditional homelike atmosphere, its excellent cuisine and its up-to-date conveniences.
